name: Chromaticus
description:
Chromaticus is a fast paced 2D side-scroller action game, where you change colors to absorb bullets and accumulate score.

If you manage to beat the creator's highscore, tweet it to @summagames and we'll work with you to add a powerup of your choice!

It's completely free and has no in app purchases!

In Chromaticus you control a spaceship and it's your job to lead it against an onslaught of enemy fire. Tap to move between the rows and change colors to absorb the bullets!!
